summary.value: Silent steps bring the loudest victories.

system.description:
ALSO: Stalker, Tracker, Trapper

Hunters are masters of the wild — expert trackers, survivalists, and trappers who possess a deep understanding, respect, and connection to nature or the environment in which they specialize in hunting. They revere the cycle of life and often form a symbiotic bond with the creatures they hunt, utilizing the abilities and instincts of their quarry to enhance their own. While some Hunters prefer a nomadic life, others take root and become one with their habitat, whether natural, urban or rural. Therefore,the Hunter's prowess extends beyond the natural world and can be adapted to any terrain, from populous cities to desolate landscapes.

HUNTER FREE BENEFITS
  • Permanently increase your maximum IP by 2.
  • Gain the ability to equip martial ranged weapons and martial melee weapons.

HUNTER SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.G3PsZ2JOeBn3tQlL]{Lock-on}

You may use an action and spend 10 Mind Points to lock onto a target. During the next turn, any action performed by an ally against this target gains a +2 bonus to associated Checks.

If all performed Checks against the target during this time are successful, the target also suffers weak.

If the target is reduced to 0 Hit Points (HP) while under the eﬀect of this Skill, you may immediately mark another target at no additional MP cost.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.TiymkOo3y9KboBdt]{Set Trap} (SL5)

You master the art of creating and deploying traps. Each time you acquire this Skill, you progressively learn to create better traps. You can only learn two traps from each corresponding Skill Level (SL) (see next page).

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.SszkVbiIJqsMBm8A]{Track} (SL5)

You may spend 10 MP to track prey that is not currently in the scene and whose leads can be followed through conventional, hunter-related means. The target must roll an Opposed 【WLP + INS】 Check against you, and you gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 on this check.

If the tracking is successful, you arrive at the prey’s location. If a conﬂict begins, your ﬁrst Accuracy Check gains a bonus of 【 SL 】 against the prey. If successful, it deals an additional 【HR + 15】 damage.

This ability ends if you are reduced to 0 HP, attack the prey, choose to track another target, or by Game Master ruling.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.mt0XIbBmyKyHeIfB]{Vital Strike}

After a successful Accuracy Check, you may spend 10 Mind Points. The targeted creatures suffer additional damage equal to your 【DEX】 die size. If a creature is already in Crisis, or would enter Crisis with your attack, it also suffers an 5 additional damage.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.92nK16j7z8OveUOE]{Wild Reflexes} (SL5)

When you perform the Guard action, if you choose not to provide cover to another creature, your reflexes are wildly increased. Until the start of your next turn, you gain a bonus to your Defense equal to 【SL】.

Additionally, if an enemy misses you with an attack during the effect of this skill, you may perform a free attack against that creature. Treat your High Roll (HR) as 0 when calculating the damage for this counterattack
